name: TURBOSTUNTS
description:
!!THE WEBGL VERSION LOOKS BAD, IF YOU LIKE THE GAME I RECOMMEND DOWNLOADING THE DESKTOP VERSION!!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Platform your way across some crazy tracks while pulling off the craziest stunts with a jet motor powered car!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

W,A,S,D Car to move on ground and air

Space to jump (the more you hold the higher you jump)

Left Click to boost

Right Click to break

Left Shift in order to rotate like a corkscrew when in the air (not important)

R to reset level

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Code by: Gerard Belenguer 

Follow we on twitter for more thingies made by me: @GerardBelenguer (https://twitter.com/GerardBelenguer)

3D assets and music from: Free stuffs from the internet

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Game created for the Ludum Dare 41
